content.question: For time <math><semantics><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>></mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>0</mn></mrow><annotation>MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVCI8FfYJH8YrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbb a9q8WqFfeaY=biLkVcLq=JHqpepeea0=as0Fb9pgeaYRXxe9vr0=vr 0=vqpWqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaabaaaaaaaaape GaamiDaiabg6da+iaabccacaaIWaaaaa@3969@</annotation></semantics></math> , the position of an object moving in the xy-plane is given by the parametric equations <math><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext> </mtext><mo>=</mo><mi>t</mi><mi>c</mi><mi>o</mi><mi>s</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>/</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><annotation>MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVCI8FfYJH8YrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbb a9q8WqFfeaY=biLkVcLq=JHqpepeea0=as0Fb9pgeaYRXxe9vr0=vr 0=vqpWqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaabaaaaaaaaape GaamiEa8aadaqadaqaa8qacaWG0baapaGaayjkaiaawMcaa8qacaqG GaGaeyypa0JaamiDaiaadogacaWGVbGaam4Ca8aadaqadaqaa8qaca WG0bGaai4laiaaikdaa8aacaGLOaGaayzkaaaaaa@435D@</annotation></semantics></math> and <math><semantics><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mrow><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow><annotation>MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahmart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWG5bGaaiikaiaadshacaGGPaGaeyypa0ZaaOaaa8aabaWdbiaa dshapaWaaWbaaSqabeaapeGaaGOmaaaakiabgUcaRiaaikdacaWG0b aaleqaaaaa@3F44@</annotation></semantics></math> . What is the speed of the object at time <math><semantics><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mtext> </mtext><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation>MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVCI8FfYJH8YrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbb a9q8WqFfeaY=biLkVcLq=JHqpepeea0=as0Fb9pgeaYRXxe9vr0=vr 0=vqpWqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaabaaaaaaaaape GaamiDaiabg2da9iaabccacaaIXaaaaa@3968@</annotation></semantics></math> ?
